评论概述: Not ideal for large natural breasts but very cute!
评论详情: I really wanted this to fit but my girls up top won't let me be great. This dress is not ideal for women with natural large breasts. I'm a H cup in US size and FF in UK size. I tried it on with a strapless bra and as you can see in the photos, my bra was revealed underneath and the sides. I also tried it without a bra but that DEFINITELY didn't work because there isn't any support to keep the girls up. The length is good as I am 5'6. If my chest could fit I wouldn't have returned it because it's such a cute dress for a variety of occasions. It's versatile for sure! No pockets. The fabric is on the thinner side but breathable. It's giving easy breezy and beautiful if you can fit your chest.  The fabric is on the thinner side
